title: crossborder
extract: between different countries, or involving people or businesses from different countries: cross-border mergers. cross-border trade. (Definition of “cross-border” from the Cambridge Business English Dictionary © Cambridge University Press)
extract_html: between different countries, or involving people or businesses from different countries: cross-border mergers. cross-border trade. (Definition of “cross-border” from the Cambridge Business English Dictionary © Cambridge University Press)
